metadata.title: CVE-2020-15888 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Lua through 5.4.0 mishandles the interaction between stack resizes andgarbage collection, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow, heap-basedbuffer over-read, or use-after-free.

criterions.comment: lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
